name: Baffin Flare Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
description: Go force this winter with fantastically warm boots that are surprisingly light and agile. The synthetic insulation and grippy outsoles deal with icy conditions without feeling like clompy winter footwear.Uppers are suede with laces to accommodate layers.Drawcord at top seals out snow.B-TEK Lite hollow fibre synthetic insulation is light not bulky, and provides cold-weather comfort.Midsole are Airflex hybrid blend lined with super-light TPU.Outsoles are rubber with slip resistant patches.Manufacturer's active rating is -50°C.
